resources.string: Click on the button below to begin creating your reminder!
Discard your changes and quit editing?
No reminders. To create a reminder, click on the plus button at the bottom right of the screen.
This app allows you to create tasks, save them and get a reminder in the future. To create a new task, click on the plus button shown below

In order to save a task, make sure you fill all the fields i.e.reminder title, description, date and time an then click the tick button shown to save. You can optionally choose to repeat a task by switching on repeat. You can enter repetition interval and select repeat type too. Remember the date and time you chose, is when you will get a reminder.
Click on the task and select delete button shown. The reminder will be deleted too.You can click on done icon to move tasks to the ones that are done.
Click on the task icon and edit as required then click the save button to update the reminder. You can turn off notification by clicking notification icon at the bottom
Click on the delete button shown to delete all tasks including reminders. You can select delete icon to delete all tasks, either completed or uncompleted
Click on Completed Task history. Remember to Click on done button after selecting one or more tasks You can exit, share the app, change pin or sign out any time.

Initial Release
Features:
. Ability to create tasks
. Ability to set Reminders
. Delete single and multiple tasks
. View Created tasks

. Added Done Tasks
. Added Task Analysis
. Support Navigation Drawer
. Added multiple seletion
. Sorting by date
. Added Search functionality
. Changed font
Click on the 3 dots to view between different charts
